loans.name: Bilgee

texts.en: Mrs. Bilgee, 56 years old, lives with her husband and two children in Selenge province of Mongolia. Her husband is a pension. Bilgee started her retailing business on rental counters in 1998. She sales clothes and shoes. Nowadays,  She owns her own work place. Her business is sustainable and has  many regular customers and suppliers. During the new session, her business demand increases. Thus, He wants to buy more products she sells in order to increase my business income as well as profit.  She needs 2,000,000 MNT to purchase shoes for children with coming school new year.  She is a hardworking and hilarious woman.

loans.use: To purchase shoes for children with coming school new year

loans.name: Gansuh

texts.en: Mr.Gansuh lives with her wife in a apartment of Uvurhangai province. He is 26 years old. Her wife work in the local bank. He worked by assistant driver from 2004 to 2006. He started his business in 2006 by transporting goods and people. Since then, he has been continuously transporting. He has many years of business and practical experience. He is a public and reticent man. He is a hard-working and diligent man. He is requesting a 3,000,000MNT loan to purchase spare parts for his car.

loans.use: To purchase spare parts for his car

loans.name: Ariunaa

texts.en: Mrs Ariunaa is 37 years old and lives with her husband and two children in ger in  Zavhan province, Mongolia.  Her husband, Gantumur, is 40 years old.  Her daughter, Altantuya, is 15 years old. She is a second school student. Her son, Lhagvadorj, is  10 years old. He is a second school student.  Mrs Ariunaa started her business in 2008 by making Mongolian traditional boots with her husband. Her business is going well while she has collected 5 years of business and work experience. She plans to expand her business in the future. She helpful is a diligent and hard-working person who says "I want to increase my income and make my life better." She is requesting a 900,000 MNT to purchase a raw materials for her business.

loans.use: To purchase a raw materials for her business

loans.name: Erdenbat

texts.en: Mr Erdenbat is 45 years old and lives with his wife and his 4 children in a ger in Zavhan province, Mongolia. His wife, Munhtuya, is 45 years old. She is a cooker. His older son, Galbayar, is 25 years old. His younger sons, Darambazar and Daramselenge, aged 23 and 21.They are a collage student. His daughter, Tumenjargal, is 11 years old. She is a second school student.  Mr Erdenebat started a tea house and motel  businesses in 2010 with his wife. His tea house and motel is  along the road. He is planning to enlarge a work place. He is hardworking and helpful man.  He is asking 1 500 000 MNT to prepare  a building  materials for his work place

loans.use: To prepare  a building  materials for his work place

loans.name: Alice

texts.en:
Alice has had five successive years in active farming in her rural home in Kisii, South Rift, Kenya. Her farm produce includes maize, bananas, beans, and wheat, which she sells to the local markets.

Alice has requested a loan of 46,800 KES from Kiva partner Juhudi Kilimo to help her buy and insure a dairy cow. 

She hopes she will be able to buy a motorcycle from her farming income to ease supplying of the farm produce to the local markets, as well as to earn additional income from transport services offered to fellow farmers for a fee. She also plans to educate her two children who are still schooling.

She says the main challenges are the unpredictable calamities like hailstorms and animal diseases. She is glad Juhudi Kilimo is making loans accessible to smallholder farmers.

loans.use: to buy and insure a dairy cow.

loans.name: Erdenetsogt

texts.en: Mr Erdenetsogt is 40 years old and lives with his 4 children and wife in a ger in Uvurhangai province, Mongolia. His wife, Altantuya, is 40 years old. His daughters, Chuluuntsetseg, Chuluunchimeg, Chuluunkhishig, Undrah, aged 18, 16, 13 and 9 responsive.His older daughter is a collage student. His younger three daughters are a second school student.  He started wool trading business in 2007, with his wife. He buys a wool form herder. He is planning to increase a working capital of his business. His income is little than his family cost.  He well-experienced an d hardworking man. He is asking 1 000 000 MNT to buy a more wool for his business.

loans.use: To buy a more wool for his business

loans.name: Lake Side Women's Group

texts.en:
The group is located in the outskirts of Kampala near the shores of Lake Victoria. 

Usually people that live along lake shores are faced with poverty and poor sanitation and generally are at risk of catching several diseases. However, Mohammed, in conjunction with the local area leader, mobilised and sensitized the residents, so that with the help of loans from UGAFODE, those challenges can be overcome.

With the loan, Mohammed believes he will be able to buy fresh fish directly from the fishermen.  This will save him the cost of buying from third parties who inflate the prices. This will boost his income, and he will be able to provide enough food for his family and send his four children to better schools, as well as meet the other needs of his family comfortably. (Mohamed is pictured at the back in front of the door)

He feels a great achievement, having mobilised his community members a step away from poverty.

loans.use: To buy fresh fish to sell.

loans.name: Munhzul

texts.en: Mrs.Munhzul is 44 years old and lives her husband and her two children in own old small house in Bulgan province of Mongolia. Her husband herdsman, her son goes to the secondary school and her daughter goes to the kindergarten. She started own her shoes retail trade business in 2005. She sales shoes for woman, children and man. Her husband helps her own shoes trade business sometimes. She is calm and friendly woman. She plans include expanding trade center and adding new styles and sizes of shoes. There for she is requesting 2,200,000 MNT Her goal is to prepare her children to become professionals.

loans.use: To expand her  trade center and to add new styles and sizes of shoes

loans.name: Sarantuya

texts.en: Mrs Enhtuya, age 38, lives with her husband and son in an apartment in Hovd province. Her son is a secondary school student. Her husband operates small business. She has been managing her hair salon business for 4 years. Currently, she is renting a work place, and has many regular customers. She is requesting a loan of 2,500,000MNT to purchase hair coloring and other equipment and inventory to increase her working capital, because the new season for Mongolian hair styling is coming up. She is a friendly and brave woman.

loans.use: To purchase hair color and to increase her working capital

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
Jane is fifty years old, married to James, and blessed with one child. She runs a cereal shop and plans to use the loan to add more stock to resell in her business like beans, rice and maize. She has been earning a monthly income of about 200,000 KES.

She has been in business for three years and plans to plow the anticipated profit back into the business to meet existing demands. This will be her second loan with KADET LTD. Her hope is to open up a general store.

loans.use: To add stock to her business, like beans, rice and maize.

loans.name: Ilema Group

texts.fr: Agriculteur de profession, Monsieur samilou vit avec sa femme cultivatrice et leurs 02 enfants à SOKODE. Il est âgé de 28ans. Son premier enfant a 4ans et le dernier 02 mois. C’est en 2009 qu’il est dans ce domaine. Il veut augmenter son chiffre d’affaire et rendre pérenne son activité c’est pour cela il sollicite de WAGES un premier prêt pour pouvoir atteindre son objectif. Elle voudrait épargner, assurer la santé  et scolarisation des enfants. Monsieur samilou est le responsable de leur groupement constitué que de femmes et d’hommes tous dans le domaine de l’agriculture. Ils  espèrent avec ce crédit réaliser des bénéfices et voir leurs familles s’épanouir.
texts.en:
A farmer by trade, Samilou lives with this wife, also a farmer, and their two children in Sokode. He is 28 years old. His oldest child is four years old and his youngest is two months old. He started farming in 2009. 

He wants to increase his income to make his farming sustainable. It is for this reason that he asked WAGES for his first loan.

She wants to save money to ensure their children's health and schooling. 

Samilou is responsible for this group of women and men, all who work in farming. They hope with this loan to make profits and see their families grow.

loans.use: to buy work tools

loans.name: Review Halima

texts.en:
Halima is fifty-five years old, married to Yusuf and blessed with two children. Her husband brings extra earnings assisting in support of the family. She wants the loan to purchase stock for catering.

She has been in this business for four years earning a monthly income 139,000 KES. This will be her third loan with KADEDT LTD. She will use the anticipated profit to plow back to  the business. She hopes to open a hotel in future.

loans.use: to buy stock for catering.

loans.name: David S.'s Group

texts.en:
This is a group of teachers from Magburaka, a town in Northern Sierra Leone. They have come to SMT/Kiva to seek a loan of 3,400,000.00 Sierra Leonean Leones in order to meet their immediate financial challenges. Gradually, they will repay the loan, using their monthly salaries.

Pictured on the right is David, the leader of this group. The 60 year old is a native of Mayoso village in Northern Sierra Leone. He is married to a nurse and the couple has seven children. Two are in primary school, four are in secondary school and one is in college. David has served in the teaching profession for 36 years now. He is going to use this loan in order to pay college fees for his child.

loans.use: to pay college fees for his child.

loans.name: Benjamin

texts.en:
Benjamin lives in the Eldoret area of Kenya, which is extremely fertile for agriculture. He has 4 children and has been doing this work for 7 years.  His primary income sources are milk, eggs, crops, transportation services, personal business.

He stated what is most enjoyable about farming: 'Fresh milk!' His biggest challenge is 'Transportation.' Animals on the farm have been given the names of 'Farait, tuimet.'

Benjamin was asked why he chose Juhudi Kilimo for this loan, to which he replied: 'Was encouraged by another juhudi client.'  This client was also asked what was learned during Juhudi's required microfinance training session: 'Dairy and poultry management.'

His highest monthly expense is school fees. When asked 'How will this loan benefit your family?', Benjamin replied 'He will be able to educate his children.'

As part of Juhudi's loan appraisal process, each borrower's assets are evaluated. From the following list of assets to choose from: Cow, Poultry, Pig, Bicycle, Motorcycle, Automobile, Tractor and Pump, Benjamin owns the following: (cow poultry motorcycle pump).

Juhudi Kilimo also tries to measure any change in living standards based on this loan. For this the borrower is asked which of the following items are in the household: mosquito net, electricity, solar power, running water, sewing machine, TV or DVD. Benjamin has (net).

*****By using mobile devices in the field to build this profile, Juhudi Kilimo is making its operations more efficient. This process keeps costs down, reduces paper usage and provides more information to potential Kiva lenders!*****

loans.use: To buy and insure a dairy cow

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en: Sarah is single and has four children. She has received no formal education. Sarah sells doughnuts and operates a provisions store in Krofoforao, near Abura, which she has done for the past twelve years. She uses her income to pay for school fees and other expenses. Sarah will use the loan to purchase items for her provisions store. With the new profits from her expanded business, Sarah plans to care for her children and save up for their education.

loans.use: purchase items for her provisions store

loans.name: Ama

texts.en: Ama sells maize and fante kenkey (fermented maize dough wrapped in banana leaves) in Krofoforao, near Abura. Ama has received no formal education.  She is single and has four children. Ama has been selling maize and fante kenkey for twenty-two years. She is responsible for paying school fees and other expenses. Her loan will be used to buy maize in bulk. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to invest in her children’s education.

loans.use: buy maize in bulk

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
La socia Francisca sigue perteneciendo al banco comunal “Santo Domingo” y las reuniones del banco comunal son cada treinta dias en el distrito del Cusco de la provincia del Cusco del departamento del Cusco. La socia Francisca, tiene 44 años de edad y está separada de su pareja pero tiene un hijo. La socia nació en la ciudad del Quillabamba pero  vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco. 

La socia Francisca alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta y elaboración de artesanía como por ejemplo aretes, collares y pulseras, ella no tiene un puesto de venta sino vende de forma ambulatoria en las calles  desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m. Ya son dos años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. 
La socia Francisca es mujer emprendedora y trabajadora saca adelante a su hija quien estudia la carrera profesional de biología. La socia Francisca solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales para hacer los aretes, collares y pulseras y también para pagar la mensualidad de su hija que estudia en la universidad. La socia Francisca está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Francisca still belongs to the communal bank "Santo Domingo" and the communal bank meetings happen every 30 days in the district, province, and department of Cusco. Francisca, 44, is separated from her partner, but she has a daughter. Francisca was born in the city of Quillabamba but she lives in the beautiful city of Cusco. 

Francisca alternates her daily activities with the business of selling and making jewelry, like earrings, necklaces, and bracelets. She does not have a set place to sell, rather she sells walking through the streets from 9:00 am until 5:00 pm. She has been in this business for two years already, and it is going very well for her.
 
Francisca is an enterprising and hard-working woman, and provides for her daughter, who is studying a professional degree in biology. Francisca is applying for the loan to buy materials to make the earrings, necklaces,and bracelets and also to pay the monthly university tuition for her daughter. She is happy for the loan and promises to comply with her repayment schedule.

loans.use: to buy work materials and to pay the monthly university tuition for her daughter.

loans.name: Tomas Martin

texts.es:
TOMAS TIENE 32 AÑOS VIVE CON EN UNION LIBRE TIENE TRES HIJOS VIVE EN VENTANAS PROVINCIA DE LOS RIOS.

PERTENECE A LA VRC LAS PALMAS, QUE PERTENENCE AL CANTON BABAHOYO Y SE DEDICA A LA SIEMBRE DE MAIZ, Y AREROZ.

TOMAS SE DEDICA A LA AGRICULTURA A LA SIEMBRE DE MAIZ Y ARROZ. LAS COMPRAS LAS REALIZA EN VENTANAS.

EL DINERO DEL CREDITO LO NECESITA PARA INVERTIR EN SEMILLAS, FERTILIZANTES Y FUNGICIDAS PARA LAS PLAGAS QUE AFECTAN A LOS CULTIVO.

EL SUEÑO DE TOMAS ES TENER DINERO PARA PODER COMPRAR UN TERRENO PARA CONSTRUIR LA CASA YA QUE VIVE EN CASA ARRENDADA.

LE GUSTA HACER DEPORTE CON LOS AMIGOS DEL BARRIO.
texts.en:
Tomás Martín, 32, is in a common-law marriage and has 3 children. He live with his wife and children, ages 11, 8, and 5 in Ventanas Canton, Los Rios Province. 

He is a member of VRC LAS PALMAS, located in Recinto Campo Alegre, belonging to Bab Canton. They work as farmers.

Tomás has worked as a farmer for 15 years, sowing corn and rice. He buys and sells in Pueblo Viejo.

He is applying for the loan to work his corn and rice crop and to buy manure. With the help from the credit he will be able to buy the supplies with no problem. His dream is to be able to buy a tractor. He hasn't had any problems. In his free time he likes to listen to music.

loans.use: SEMILLAS, FERTILIZANTES Y FUNGICIDAS

loans.name: Floricelda Lorena

texts.es:
FLORICELDA LORENA  tiene 36 años de edad vive en unión libre tiene 2 hijos, vive con el esposo y con los hijos  en el Cantón Ventanas provincia de los Ríos.

Pertenece a la VRC LAS PALMAS, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto campo Alegre, Pertenece al Cantón Bab se dedican a labores Agrícolas.

FLORICELDA LORENA Se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz. Las compras y las ventas lo realiza en la ciudad de Ventanas. Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, insecticidas, urea, fertilizantes, abonos. 

Con la ayuda del crédito  podrá realizar las compras sin ninguún tipo de problemas.

El sueño es poder tener una casa y tener mas terrenos. En el tiempo libre le gusta salir a caminar y cocinar.
texts.en:
Floricelda, 36, lives in a common-law marriage and has two children.  She lives with her husband and children, ages 15 and 8, in Ventanas Canton in the province of Los Ríos.  She's a member of Las Palmas Communal Bank, located in Recinto Campo Alegre in Bab Canton, where they farm.

Floricelda has worked for 10 years in farming, growing corn.  She makes her purchases and sales in Ventanas.

She's requesting the loan to plant corn and buy agricultural fertilizer.  With the help of the loan she'll be able to invest in agriculture and earn a profit.

Her dream is to be able to have a house.  She hasn't experienced any kind of problem.  In her free time she likes to visit her family.

loans.use: comprar semillas, insecticidas, urea, fertilizantes, abonos.

loans.name: Oswaldo Mauricio

texts.es:
Oswaldo tiene 33 años vive en union libre en un casa arrenda tiene dos hijos vive en Ventanas.

Es miembro de la VRC. Las palmas esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agricolas como la siembra de maiz y arroz

oswaldo se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maiz y arroz. El credito le ayudado para invertir el insumos como semillas fertilizantes y polvos para matar las bacterias que dañan los cultivos.


El sueño de Oswaldo es tener dinero para poder comprar un terreno y construir la casa. 


Le gusta hacer deporte con los amigos del barrio y jugar con los hijos.
texts.en:
Oswaldo, 33, lives in a common-law marriage and has two children. He lives with his wife and children, ages 15 and 8, in Ventanas Canton in the province of Los Ríos. He's a member of Las Palmas Communal Bank, located in Recinto Campo Alegre in Bab Canton, where they make a living farming.

Oswaldo has worked for 15 years in farming, growing corn and rice. He makes his purchases and sales in Ventanas.

He's requesting the loan to plant corn and buy compost. With the help of the loan he'll be able to invest in agriculture and earn a profit.

His dream is to be able to have a house. He hasn't experienced any kind of problem. In his free time he likes to go out for walks.

loans.use: fertilizantes y polvos para matar las bacterias

loans.name: Lorena Pilar

texts.es:
Lorena  tiene 26 años. Vive en Unión Libre, vive con el compañero y los hijos viven  en el cantón de Ventanas en la Provincia de Los Ríos. Tiene 3 hijos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. UNIDOS SOMO MAS, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto el Marañon, por la parroquia Puerto Pechiche perteneciente al Cantón Pueblo viejo, esta ventanilla se dedica labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz fréjol. 

Se dedica de manera especial a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol desde hace 2 años. Los productos los compra y los vende en la ciudad de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos agrícolas, fertilizantes, urea, líquido mata monte, ranger. Con el apoyo del crédito podrá comprar lo que le hace falta para los cultivos. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. El sueño es comprarse una casa y terrenos para sembrar más y aumentar los ingresos.

En el tiempo libre le gusta cocinar toda clase de comidas para el esposo.
texts.en:
Lorena is 26 years old. She is in a common-law marriage and lives with her partner and children in the canton of Ventanas in Los Ríos province. She has three children. 

The solidarity group Unidos Somos Más is located in the area of Marañon, in Puerto Pechiche parish, which belongs to the canton of Pueblo Viejo. The members of this group work in short cycle farming. They grow corn, rice, and beans. 

Lorena has worked especially growing corn, rice and beans for the past two years. She buys her products in Comercial López in Ventanas and sells them in the Ventanas market and in the same area. 

She is requesting the loan in order to purchase farm supplies and fertilizers for her crops. The support provided by this loan will help her financially to meet her needs. She faces challenges such as pests, diseases, and the changing climate. 

Her dream is to have her own house. 

She likes to cook all types of food.

loans.use: la comprar de insumos agrícolas, fertilizantes, urea, líquido mata monte, ranger

loans.name: Ines Marlene

texts.es:
INES MARLENE tiene 38 años de edad vive en unión libre vive junto a su esposo y sus  hijos en el Cantón Pueblo Viejo perteneciente a Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

Pertenen a  la V.R.C. UNIDO SOMOS  se encuentra ubicada en el recinto El Marañón por la Parroquia Puerto Pechiche perteneciente al Cantón Pueblo Viejo,  esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol.

 INES MARLENE se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, además se dedica a ala crianza de pollos y cerdos. Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, urea,  ranger, insumos y  abonos agrícolas, fertilizantes .

Con el apoyo del crédito podrá comprar los fertilizantes para tratar la tierra que este lista para las siembras.

El sueño es comprar una finca con una casa. En el tiempo libre le gusta practicar leer la biblia.
texts.en:
Ines Marlene is 38 years old and lives with her common-law husband and their three children (ages 16, 13, and 11) in the canton of Pueblo Viejo, which is part of the Ventanas Province of Los Ríos. 

The members of the Communal Bank “Unido Somos” (We Are United) meet in the neighborhood of El Marañón in the parish of Puerto Pechiche, which belongs to the canton of Pueblo Viejo. The Communal Bank consists of short-cycle farmers who grow corn, rice, and beans. 

Ines works in agriculture, growing corn, rice, and beans. She buys her supplies at the Agro Karlita Commercial Center and sells her products at the Castillo Commercial Market. 

Ines is requesting a loan for planting corn, rice, and beans. She plans to buy seeds, urea, compost, farming supplies, and liquid fertilizers for her crops. 

With the financial support of this loan, she will be able to purchase what she needs. Among the challenges she faces are pests, diseases, and changes in weather. The help from this loan will make it easier for her to acquire supplies. 

Her dream is to be able to buy a house. During her free time, Ines enjoys playing sports.

loans.use: comprar semillas, urea,  ranger, insumos y  abonos agrícolas, fertilizantes .

loans.name: Clara Virginia

texts.es:
Clara tiene 53 años de edad vive en uniuón libre junto a su esposo e hijos en el Cantón Pueblo Viejo perteneciente a Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

Pertenence a la V.R.C. UNIDO SOMOS  se encuentra ubicada en el recinto El Marañón por la Parroquia Puerto Pechiche perteneciente al Cantón Pueblo Viejo,  esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol.

Se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, además se dedica a la crianza de animales. Compra y vende los productos en la ciudad de Ventanas. 

Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas de maíz, arroz y comprar urea,  insumos y  abonos agrícolas, fertilizantes .

Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría a comprar lo necesario para la siembra y podrá mejorar el estilo de vida de la familia.. 
 El sueño es poder comprarse maquinaria para poder trabajar en los terrenos y que las ganancias aumenten. En el  tiempo libre le gusta escuchar música y salir a caminar.
texts.en:
Clara is 54 years old and she and her husband have three children, ages 25, 22, and 14. They live in the canton Pueblo Viejo, which is part of the Ventanas Province of Los Rios.

The members of the UNIDOS SOMOS (We are United) community bank are located in the El Marañón neighborhood in the Puerto Pechiche parish, which belongs to Pueblo Viejo.  This group consists of farmers who grow short cycle crops such as corn, rice and beans. 

Clara grows corn, rice and beans. She buys her supplies from Agroinsumos Karlita, a farming supply company, and sells her crops at the Castillo market. 

Clara is requesting a loan to be able to plant corn, rice, and beans and to buy more seeds, urea, compost, liquid fertilizers and other supplies for her crops.  The economic support of this loan will empower her to provide for the necessities.  She faces challenges such as insects and plant diseases, as well as the variability in the climate and this loan will enable her to buy the supplies she needs.  Her dream is to buy farm equipment to help her work the fields.  In her spare time, she enjoys listening to music.

loans.use: comprar semillas de maíz, arroz y comprar urea,  insumos y  abonos agrícolas, fertilizantes .

loans.name: Nelson Eduardo

texts.es:
Nelson tiene 22 años de edad es soltero no tiene hijos, vive con los padres en Chimbo Provincia de Bolívar.

Nelson es controlador en un bus. Solicita el crédito para comprar libros, computadora portatil.

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar lo que necesita para poder realizar los trabajos de la universidad.

La compra la va hacer en Guaranda. El sueño es poder superarse obtener el título universitario . El desafío al que enfrenta es luchar contra cualquier adversidad que se presente.

En el tiempo libre le gusta dedicarse a la lectura y la investigación.
texts.en:
Nelson is 22 years old, single, and does not have any children. He lives with his parents in Chimbo, in the province of Bolívar. 

Nelson is a bus traffic controller.

He is requesting this loan to purchase a computer. With the help from this loan, he will be able to buy a computer to complete his school work, since he is studying by distance learning. 

He will purchase it in Guaranda. 

His dream is to improve his quality of life. The challenge he faces is working against any adversity that presents itself. 

He enjoys spending his free time reading.

loans.use: comprar libros, computadora portatil.

loans.name: La Union Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “LA UNION”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Rosa Maria ella es casada y tiene 41 años y tiene 3 hijos; La socia trabaja con su negocio de venta de productos de belleza, la socia vende lápiz labiales,perfumes,cremas entre otros, la socia anteriormente se dedicaba al negocio de crianza de animales como cuyes y gallinas pero no le fue muy bien porque al mes no vendía muchos animales y no le alcanzaba para estudios de sus hijos pero este negocio de venta de productos de belleza le va muy bien, la socia ya tiene 3 años en este negocio de venta de productos de belleza, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los productos de belleza. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar perfumes, cremas y lápiz labiales al por mayor.
Los otros socios que estan pegados a la foto grupal se le tomo despues de la reunion porque pidieron permiso por motivos de trabajo ya que ellos no pudieron asistir el dia de la reunion porque sus jefes no les  quisieron dar permiso para que vayan a ala reunion.
 Los otros socios  se dedican al negocio de venta de artesanía, negocio de venta de crianza de animales, negocio de venta de tejas, negocio de venta de chicha y negocio de venta de comida.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to La Unión Communal Bank, located in the Cusco district in the province and department of Cusco.

The member, Rosa María, 41, is married and has three children.  She works with her business selling beauty products.  She sells lipstick, perfume, and creams, among other things.  Previously she raised animals such as guinea pigs and chickens, but it didn't go well for her because she didn't sell many animals in a month and she didn't have enough money for her children's school expenses.  But this business selling beauty products is going very well for her.  She has been in the business for three years.  Her dream is to have a place where she can sell her products.

She's requesting the loan to buy perfume, cream, and lipstick wholesale.

The other members who are attached to the group photo had permission to have their photos taken later due to work.  The other members work in arts and crafts, animal sales, tile sales, "chica" [a traditional beverage] sales, and food sales.

The member thanks those who are part of her dream and she promises to make the payments by the established deadline.

loans.use: to buy perfume, creams, and lipstick wholesale

loans.name: Motiana

texts.en:
Motiana is 53 years old and married with six children. She has a small garden where she grows taros and bananas that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for three years. Motiana needs a loan to purchase new tools and equipment (weed sprayer, fertilizers, weed killer, etc.) 

She has been a member of SPBD since 2010. Motiana will use the profits from her sales to help her family with their financial situation and her children for better education.

loans.use: to purchase a wheel barrow, bush cutter, gloves, and shovel.

loans.name: Tiana

texts.en:
Mesepi is a 51-year-old married woman with six children. She has a small plantation and grows green beans, cabbages, green peppers and green onions to earn a living. She has been doing this for one year. 

Mesepi has requested a loan to buy fertilizers, a hose set, seeds and spades. She has been a member of SPBD since 2012. With her profits, Mesepi hopes to help her kids' education and her family matters.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, a hose set, seeds and spades.

loans.name: Lun

texts.en: Lun is 57 years old. She is widowed and resides with four children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in weaving for more than ten years, earning approximately $3 daily. Her children are still in her care. In order to improve her family’s living conditions, Lun is requesting a loan of $600 to purchase silk threads to use for weaving more Krama (traditional Cambodian scarves) to sell. By doing so, she would earn more income to support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children earn bachelor’s degrees. Moreover, she hopes to build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase silk threads to use for weaving more Krama (traditional scarves) to sell.

loans.name: Gpf Medina Mounawara Group

texts.fr: Le groupement "Gpf medina mounawara" se compose de 18 femmes habitantes toutes le même village.Elles exploitent un champs collectif d'arachide à coté du village.En fin d'hivernage, la production est vendue aux grands commerçants et leur permet d'obtenir des revenus financiers assez inintéressants.Elles parviennent ainsi à prendre en charge les besoins vestimentaires de leurs enfants ainsi que leurs propres besoins.Le chef du groupe (en rouge, au milieu, entre les deux vaches),est mère de quatre enfants dont les deux fréquentent l'école primaire.Elle prend en charge leurs frais de scolarité et de santé avec les bénéfices tirés de l'exploitation du champs collectif et d'un petit commerce de denrées alimentaires qu'elle mène en saison sèche.Le groupe sollicite un pret de 990000f pour acheter des semences et des engrais afin de renforcer son activité.
texts.en:
The group "Gpf Medina Mounawara" is made up of 18 women who live in the same village.  They operate a collective peanut field near the village.  At the end of the rainy season, the produce is sold to large traders and provides rather significant financial income.  They are able to take care of clothing their children as well as their own personal needs. 
The leader of the group (pictured in red in the middle, between the two cows) is the mother of four children, two of whom are in primary school.  She takes care of their tuition and well-being with the income from the collective field and from a small food business she conducts in the dry season.  The group is seeking a loan of 990,000f to buy seeds and fertilizers to strengthen their business.

loans.use: acheter des semences et des engrais

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John is a 28-year-old single businessman. He has been selling clothes for the past four years with a monthly income of KES 9,500, which he uses to meet his basic needs. 

He is applying for his first loan term with KADET after being introduced by an existing KADET customer. John will use the loan to buy more stocks of clothes for resale. With the anticipated profits from the business, he will expand his business. 

He hopes to open a boutique shop and improve his future living standards.

loans.use: To buy more stocks of clothes.

loans.name: Gpf Keur Aly Samba Group

texts.fr: Le groupement "Gpf Keur aly samba" sez compose de dix huit femmes qui pratiquent toutes l'agriculture.Elles cultivent un champs collectif de mil.La vente de leur récolte génère des revenus qui leur permettent de subvenir à leurs besoins et à ceux de leurs familles.Le chef du groupement (à l'extrémité droite de la photo ) est mère de trois enfants. Elle cultive un champs secondaire d'arachide en plus du champs collectif du groupe.Le groupement sollicite un pret de 990000f pour acheter des semences et de l'engrais afin d'augmenter leur production.
texts.en:
The "Gpf Keur aly samba" group is made up of 18 women who are all farmers. They grow millet in collective fields. The sale of their harvest generates revenue that allows them to cover their needs as well as those of their families.

The group leader (on the far right-hand side of the photograph) is a mother of three children. She grows peanuts in secondary fields, in addition to the group's collective fields.

The group is seeking a loan of 990,000 f to buy seeds and fertilizer in order to increase their production.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Judith

texts.es:
La socia Judith es natural de la ciudad del Cusco, vive en la misma ciudad donde nació, tiene 34 años de edad y tiene 2 hijos. 

La socia Judith sigue perteneciendo al banco comunal “Santo Domingo" y sigue con el negocio de venta de jugos, ella sigue vendiendo en uno de los mercados de la ciudad del cusco, ella trabaja en el negocio de venta de jugos desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 9:00 p.m. Ya son 10 años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al desempeño de su trabajo. La socia tambien alquila carros que sirven para brindar servicio de trasportes.  

La socia Judith solicita el préstamo para comprar más frutas como por ejemplo manzanas, naranjas, piñas, papayas, plátanos y otras más. La socia Judith está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Communal bank member Judith is a native of the city of Cusco. She lives in the same city where she was born. She is 34 years old and has two children.

She continues to be a member of the "Santo Domingo" communal bank and continues with her business of selling juice. She still sells in one of the markets of the city of Cusco. She works in her juice business from 7 am until 9 pm. She has already worked in this business for 10 years and it is going very well for her, thanks to her performance of her work.

Judith is applying for the loan to buy more fruits, for example, apples, oranges, pineapples, papayas, bananas, and others. She is happy about the loan and promises to make her payments.

loans.use: to maintain her car and buy spare parts and tires.

loans.name: Yaa

texts.en:
Yaa is a petty trader. She operates a grocery shop in Bereman near Abura. The items in her grocery shop are milk, milo, sugar, soups, different kinds of soft drinks, tinned tomatoes, tinned fish, biscuits, toffees, powdered milk and kenkey. She has been doing this for two years.

Yaa is married to a farmer and has three children. She uses her income to support her husband in the general upkeep of their home.  

Yaa needs this loan to purchase a variety of grocery items to satisfy her customers. With the new profit, Yaa wishes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase variety of grocery items to satisfy her customers.

loans.name: Olataga

texts.en: Olataga is a 33-year-old married woman with three children. She would like to start growing taro, bananas, taamu, etc., to earn a living. Olataga has requested a loan to buy equipment to use for her business. She has been a member of SPBD for 0 years. Olataga will spend her profits to improve her business and improve her family income.

loans.use: to buy a bush cutter, bush knives, shovel, and wheelbarrow for her business.

loans.name: Veronika

texts.en: Veronika is a 27-year-old married woman with 4 children. She has a small plantation and grows taro and bananas to earn a living. She has been doing this for many years. Veronika has requested a loan to improve her home and also her business. She has been a member of SPBD since 2010. With her profits, Veronika hopes to save more to help towards her children's education.

loans.use: iron roof,cement,chemicals,knife,taro crop, bush knives,..

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en:
Stephen is a 27-year-old married man. He describes himself as a determined and ambitious man. He operates a motorcycle providing transportation services. He has been involved in this business for three years. His business is located along a busy road and his primary customers are residents and business people. He describes his biggest business challenge to be frequent accidents along the road making it hard to pass restricted areas with customers. 

Stephen will use this 20,000 Kenyan shilling loan to buy another motorbike to meet customer demand. His business goal is to expand his business by running a motorcycle showroom for the display of motorcycles for sale within five years. He hopes to buy land for his family in the future.

loans.use: to buy another motorbike

loans.name: Maha

texts.en: Due to cultural reasons, Maha prefers that her photo not be on the Internet. Thus, the above photo is of her husband. Maha is a 25-year-old married woman from Sahab, Jordan. She is requesting a loan of 500 JD to buy blankets to sell to her family and neighbors in the same area. In the future, she would like to develop her project by buying other products to sell to increase her family's income. Since Maha is under 30 years old, her loan is considered a youth loan.

loans.use: to buy blankets to sell

loans.name: Hanan

texts.en:
For cultural reasons, Hanan prefers that her photo is not on the Internet.  Thus the above photo is of her son. 

Hanan is a 46-year-old married woman from Sahab, Jordan, who supports three family members. 

She is requesting a loan of 700 JD to pay for home improvements.  She will be repainting her home and do maintenance of the rooms. In the future she would like to buy a new home.

loans.use: to pay for home improvements.

loans.name: Swzan

texts.en:
Due to cultural reasons, Swzan prefers that her photo is not on the Internet; thus the above photo is of her husband. 

Swzan is a 24-year-old married woman from Baqa'a Jordan who supports two family members.  She is requesting a loan of 400 JD to pay for her home improvements. She would like to buy household and she will be repainting her home. In the future she would like to provide a good environment for her family. 

Since Swzan is under 30 years old,  her loan is considered a youth loan.

loans.use: to pay for her home improvements

loans.name: Kyere Wo Do Group

texts.en:
Patience is 30 years old. She is a hardworking woman, married with two children. 

She is a fishmonger and lives at Aboadze a suburb in Takoradi. Out of this business, she takes care of her family. 

She wants to use the loan opportunity to buy more fish to increase her stock of goods for sale.  She hopes to raise good income to help her husband pay the children’s school fees. 

She is a member of the trust group called “Kyere wo do,” which means "show your love" group. In this group, members guarantee for one another as social collateral to access a loan and apply peer pressure to repay the loan.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Adwoa

texts.en: Adwoa sells traditionally-made soaps and pampers. She is married and has seven children. Her husband is a carpenter. Adwoa uses her income to support her family in the general upkeep of the home. She will use the loan to purchase more ingredients to prepare soap to sell. With the new profits from her expanded business, Adwoa plans to reinvest for further growth.

loans.use: to purchase more ingredients to prepare soap to sell

loans.name: Jaguar Group

texts.en:
Ruth, who is in her early 30s, is single with one child who still goes to school. She has been running a fruit and vegetable business for nine months. Ruth works from 8am to 8pm daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit.

She is requesting her fourth loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. Ruth used the previous loans to buy stock for her business and to pay her child's school fees and has successfully repaid all her loans. She now wants a loan to buy more stock of fruits and vegetables. Her dream is to one day be a big businesswoman.

Ruth will share this loan with her loan group "Jaguar" which has a total of 14 members. The members of the group will hold each other accountable for repaying the loan.

loans.use: to buy more stock of fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Monica

texts.en:
Monica is a hardworking married woman with three children living in Masindi, Uganda. The responsibility of looking after the family solely rests on her, and her personal goal is to educate her children to attain higher qualifications and also to build a permanent house as they are currently living in a mud wattled house.

She operates a salon and cosmetic shop that has enabled her to pay school fees and also pay rent for the business premises. Her dream is to buy land to grow crops since agriculture is the most productive sector of the economy. Monica intends to use the loan to buy cosmetics to sell.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics to sell.

loans.name: Margret

texts.en:
Margret is 52 years old and lives in Masindi, Uganda. For four years she has been operating a retail shop and she sold her plot of land to get start up capital.

Margret has challenges of customers not paying on time and price fluctuation limiting her projected profits.She has dreams of building a permanent home, moving her business to more permanent place, and owning a wholesale shop.

Margret intends to use the loan to buy general merchandise such as sugar and soap to sell.

loans.use: to buy general merchandise such as sugar and soap to sell.

loans.name: Kathya Lisset

texts.es:
Kathya es una mujer de 22 años, vive en la ciudad de Pisco con sus padres y su pequeño hijo de 1 año, a quien ama y es su principal razón en la vida, lamentablemente por diversas razones se separó de su pareja, desde entonces ella dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su pequeño, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, lamentablemente no ha podido estudiar la carrera profesional de Enfermería que tanto deseaba, pero sueña con poder hacerlo algún día, en sus ratos libres le gusta hacer deporte y en algunas ocasiones cocina un delicioso Ají de Gallina para compartir con su familia.

Con mucho empeño, entusiasmo y gracias al apoyo de su madre, Kathya puso en marcha su pequeño negocio de venta de abarrotes y productos de belleza, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor, ella puede trabajar un aproximado de 12 horas diarias y cree que le va bien por la variedad de productos y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.

Kathya se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra mercadería para su negocio, tales como: arroz, azúcar, leche, gaseosas, golosinas, entre otro y productos de belleza, como: maquillaje, perfumes, lociones, etc.; de esta manera Kathya tendrá su negocio mejor abastecido, con ello espera poder aumentar sus ventas e incrementar sus ingresos económicos , los cuales le servirán de mucho para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda ampliar su negocio y tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Kathya is a 22-year-old woman. She lives in the city of Pisco with her parents and her small ((???)) year-old son, whom she loves and who is her principal cause in life. 

Regrettably, for various reasons, she separated from her partner, and since then she has dedicated all her effort to moving her son forward. She is a very nice, hard-working and enthusiastic person. Regrettably, she has not been able to study the nursing career that she so longed to pursue, but she dreams of being able to do so one day. 

In her free time she likes to do sports and on some occasions she cooks a delicious Ají de Gallina (Peruvian chicken stew) to share with her family.

With determination, enthusiasm, and thanks to the support of her mother, Kathya started her small business selling groceries and beauty products. Every day she begins working in the early morning hours. She can work approximately 12 hours per day and she believes it is going well for her due to her variety of products and the friendly treatment she offers her clients.

Kathya is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to the help they offer she will be able to purchase merchandise for her business such as rice, sugar, milk, sodas, candy, and more as well as beauty products such as makeup, perfumes, lotions, etc. Thus Kathya's business will be better-stocked, and with this she hopes to be able to increase her sales and increase her income, which will help her greatly so that in the near future she can grow her business and have her own house.

loans.use: to purchase groceries and beauty products

loans.name: Jorge Luis

texts.es:
Jorge es un hombre de 29 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Camaná, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente por la necesidad de trabajar para solventar sus gastos no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta ir de pesca con sus amigos y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Lomo Saltado para compartir con su familia.
Con mucho empeño y entusiasmo, Jorge trabaja como chofer de taxi, él brinda servicios de transporte, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor, él puede trabajar un aproximado de 10 horas diarias y cree que le va bien porque conoce las zonas donde encontrar mayor cantidad de pasajeros, así también por el trato amable y respetuoso que brinda a sus clientes.

Jorge se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de llantas para su auto; de esta manera jorge contará con su vehículo en mejores condiciones para poder seguir trabajando y así brindar un mejor servicio para sus clientes; de esta manera Max podrá aumentar sus ingresos económicos, los cuales le servirán de mucho para que en un futuro no  muy lejano pueda adquirir su casa propia.
texts.en:
Jorge is 29 years old, single, and lives in the city of Camaná.  He is a very friendly, hard-working, enthusiastic person who has a great desire to do well in life.  Unfortunately, because he needed to work in order to cover his expenses he wasn't able to study for a degree.  However, he would have very much liked to have done so.  In his free time, he enjoys going fishing with his friends and he sometimes cooks a delicious 'lomo saltado' to share with his family.

Jorge works very hard in his job as a taxi driver, providing transport services.  He works every day, from early in the morning.  He works approximately 10 hours a day and believes that his business is doing well because he knows which areas have the most passengers and because he is both friendly and respectful toward his customers.

Jorge is very grateful to Kiva lenders because, thanks to their help, he will be able to buy tires for his car.  This will help improve the condition of his vehicle and he will be able to continue working, providing a better service to his customers.  In this way, he will be able to increase his income which will help him to acquire his own house in the not-too-distant future.

loans.use: to buy tires for his car

loans.name: Marcelita

texts.en:
Marcelita works hard to support her family. Marcelita is married and has a ambulant vending dry goods business in the Philippines.

Marcelita requested a PHP 15000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stocks to sell in her business.

Marcelita has been in this business for 10 years now.

In the future, Marcelita would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional stock to sell in her business

loans.name: Agatha

texts.en: Agatha is a baker. She bakes and sells bread. She has been in this business for 15 years.  She lives with her husband and two children at Abuboku, near Abura. Agatha will use her loan to purchase flour, sugar and cooking oil for her bakery. With the new profit, she will buy an additional oven to enable her to work faster.

loans.use: to purchase flour, sugar and cooking oil for her bakery

loans.name: Ednah

texts.en:
Ednah lives in the Mariakani area of Coast Province, Kenya. She is married. She owns a video cafe and a retail shop business which she has been operating for five years.

She learned about Milango through friends who invited her to the group. She joined with the aim of accessing credit to improve her business operations. Her main challenge is high fuel and transport prices.

Ednah is applying for a loan of 21,050 Kenyan shillings (KES) to buy video films and expand the business premises. Her extra income from the loan will be added to her savings to expand her business. Her dream is to own a wholesale and a cinema hall.

loans.use: to buy video films and expand the business premises.

loans.name: Rosas De Visalaya Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “ROSAS DE VISALAYA” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Copacabana, está compuesta por catorce integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Dominga es la Presidenta, ella se encuentra en el centro del grupo vestida con manta cafe y esta contando el dinero. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: pesca, venta de carne, venta de pescado, tienda de barrio, venta de carnes, venta de queso y papa, venta de cerveza, venta de carne y verdura.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Dominga es una integrante, ella indica que es la primera vez que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de una promotora de la institución que fue a su casa a invitarla. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de tienda de venta de carne, da a conocer que este negocio lo esta trabajando desde sus 18 años siendo 40 años de trabajo en esta área, emprende este negocio mediante el incentivo de su amiga Candelaria.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para ampliar el negocio (compra de carne) mismo que comprará de las ferias provinciales del departamento de La Paz y posteriormente lo comercializará a pedido, todos los días. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia, pues ella es casada y tiene cuatro hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta que le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta las capacitaciones en salud y crédito.
texts.en:
The communal bank Rosas de Visalaya is starting its first cycle with Pro Mujer. Pertaining to the regional office of Copacabana, it comprises fourteen members and is managed by a Board of Directors. Dominga is the Board President. The members of this communal bank run a variety of businesses, such as fishing, selling meat, selling fish, a neighborhood store, selling cheese and potatoes, selling beer, and selling meat and vegetables. The loan they are taking out will benefit small microentrepreneurs.

Dominga is one of its members and says this is the first time she joins Pro Mujer. She has joined through a promotor of the institution, who went to her house to invite her. She currently has a business, a store where she sells meat. She says that she has been working in this business ever since she was eighteen, so she has been working in the same field for forty years. She started her own business by her friend Candelaria's incentive.

The loan she is now taking out is to expand her business. She will purchase meat from the regional markets in the department of La Paz and later make daily sales by order. This way of working allows her to generate resources in order to support her family as much as possible, for she is married and has four children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she says she enjoys the trainings regarding health and loans.

loans.use: to purchase meat.

loans.name: Paulina

texts.en: Paulina operates a mini grocery shop at Abura. She is married and has 2 children.  Her husband is a farmer. She uses her income to support her husband in educating, feeding, and clothing her children. Her loan will be used to buy variety of groceries to sell. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to build a bigger shop.

loans.use: variety of grocery like soap, canned fish and other items to sell

loans.name: 4 De Agosto Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “4 DE AGOSTO” iniciará el ciclo vigésimo sexto ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Cascada, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Filomena es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: tienda de barrio, frituras de habas y postres, venta de cosméticos, tejidos, venta de deportivos, venta de CD’s y alquiler de vajillas, venta de verduras, venta de regalos.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Filomena es una integrante, ella indica que hace tres años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de su hermana que es socias de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de tienda de barrio, ella nos cuenta que este negocio lo inicio con el primer prestamos que se hizo de nuestra institución y en actualidad le va muy bien gracias a la ayuda de su familia 

El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de azúcar, fideos, etc.) que comprará de las comerciantes que venden por mayor y posteriormente lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia, pues ella es casada y tiene cuatro hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el prestamos inmediato y los consultorios.

En la fotografía no esta presente la señora Martha porque fue a consulta médica.
texts.en:
The lending club "4 de agosto" will begin their 26th cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the focus group of Cascada. There are 8 members and have a board of directors led by the president Filomena. The members have various business like a corner shop, fried beans and desserts, cosmetics sales, tissues, athletic clothing sales, CD sales and rental of dishware, vegetable sales and gift sales.

The loan will benefit these small-business owners, including Filomena. She has been a part of Proj Mujer for 3 years, joining at the invitation of her sister who is a partner in the institution. Currently she has a corner store. She tells us that she started this business with the first loan from the institution and it's going well thanks to her family's help. 

The loan that she will take out now is to increase her capital by purchasing sugar, noodles, etc that merchants will buy in bulk to sell in their stores. This work will allow her to generate resources to support her family as much as possible, since she is married and has 4 children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responds that she likes the immediate loans and the consults.

In the picture, Martha is missing because she was at a medical appointment.

loans.use: to buy sugar, noodles, etc.

loans.name: Wilson Freddy

texts.es: Wilson tiene 28 años es soltero, no tiene hijos. El tiene un cyber y una tienda, el empezó con dos computadoras y logro reunir un capital para incrementar el número de sus computadoras. Su trabajo es todos los días de 08:00 AM hasta 23:30 PM. El temor de él es la delincuencia por eso ha puesto rejas a las maquinas para mayor seguridad. El sueño de Wilson es seguir creciendo económicamente en el negocio y expandirlo. Con el préstamo quiere compara víveres para su pequeña tienda y una computadora para darle un mejor servicio a sus clientes.  Entre sus sueños esta tener una familia y brindarles comodidad y trabajar juntos para que el negocio crezca en varios sectores en los cuales requieran del servicio.
texts.en:
Wilson is 28-years-old and is single. He does not have any children.  He has a cyber café and a store. He started with two computers and accomplished getting capital to increase the number of computers. He works everyday from 8:00 am to 23:30 pm (11:30 pm).

His fear is crime; therefore he put a lock on the machines for greater security. Wilson’s dream is to continue to improve profits and expand the business. 

With the loan he wants to buy provisions for his small store and a computer in order to better serve his customers. Among his dreams is to have a family and to provide them with a comfortable life. He wants to work together as a family to grow the business in various sectors that require his service.

loans.use: to purchase a computer and provisions

loans.name: Dewile

texts.en: Dewile is a 38-year-old married man with six children living in Fort Portal, Uganda. His personal goal is to give his children a university education. In order to supplement his farming activities, he set up a retail shop that has been in business for 18 years. He has a vision of diversifying his business to include crop production on a large scale and having a wholesale shop. Dewile needs a loan to buy sugar and salt to sell in his shop.

loans.use: to buy sugar and salt  to sell.

loans.name: Paul Walter

texts.es:
Paúl es un joven de 20 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica con sus padres y hermanos, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de sus padres Paúl se encuentra estudiando la carrera de Gastronomía, en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar futbol con sus amigos y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Chicharrón de Chancho para compartir con su familia.
Con mucho empeño, entusiasmo y gracias al apoyo de su familia, Paúl trabaja como chofer de mototaxi, todos los días desde tempranas horas de mañana él sale a recorrer las calles de su ciudad en búsqueda de pasajeros, Paúl puede trabajar un aproximado de 8 horas diarias y cree que le va bien por su dedicación y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Paúl se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada realizar la compra de repuestos para su mototaxi, tales como: carburador, faros, llantas, entre otros; de esta manera Paúl tendrá su vehículo en buenas condiciones para así seguir trabajando, con ello él espera poder aumentar sus ingresos económicos, para así poco a poco lograr su gran sueño de ser un buen profesional y un hombre de bien.

loans.use: Para la compra de repuestos para su mototaxi.

loans.name: Ana Victoria

texts.es:
Ana es una mujer de 34 años, es madres soltera, vive en la ciudad de Ica con sus 3 hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por salir adelante; lamentablemente por la necesidad de trabajar y solventar sus gastos no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, pero le hubiera gustado poder hacerlo.
Con mucho empeño y dedicación, desde hace 2 años Ana puso en marcha su pequeño negocio de venta de ropa, tanto para damas, caballeros y niños, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana ella asiste al mercado central de su ciudad para realizar sus ventas y dedica a su negocio un aproximado de 12 horas diarias, ella se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien debido a su buena atención.
Ana se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mercadería, tales como: chompas, poleras, casacas, pantalones, polos, entre otras prendas; de esta manera tendrá su negocio mejor abasteció y así espera poder aumentar sus ventas e incrementar sus ingresos económicos, los cuales en un futuro no muy lejano utilizará para asegurar la educación y bienestar de sus hijos.

loans.use: Para la compra de mercadería, tales como: chompas, poleras, casacas, pantalones, polos, etc.

loans.name: Erik Clemer

texts.es:
Erik es un hombre de 27 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Chincha con sus padres y hermanos, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente Erik no ja estudiado un carrera profesional, pero sueña con poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar futbol con sus amigos y en algunas ocasiones cocina una riquísima Carapulcra con Sopa Seca para compartir con su familia.
Con mucho empeño y entusiasmo, Erick trabaja como vendedor en una empresa de venta de ropa de su ciudad, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor, él puede trabajar un aproximado de 10 horas diarias y cree que le va bien por su dedicación, buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Erik se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de insumos, tales como sacos de harina, manteca, azúcar, dulces, entre otros; de esta manera Erik contará con los insumos necesario para la preparación de diversos postres para su venta, con ello él espera poder aumentar sus ingresos económicos, los cuales se servirán de mucho para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda tener su negocio de repostería y así espera lograr su gran sueño de ser un buen profesional y ayudar a su familia.

loans.use: Para la compra de insumos, tales como sacos de harina, manteca, azúcar, dulces,etc.

loans.name: Karla Cecilia

texts.es:
Karla es una joven de 19 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica con sus padres y hermanos, a pesar de ser tan joven ella es una persona muy amable, responsable y trabajadora, que tiene un gran deseo de superación, lamentablemente Karla no ha podido estudiar la carrera profesional de Enfermería que tanto desea, pero sueño con poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta relajarse escuchando un poco de música y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Pollo para compartir con su familia.
Con mucho empeño y entusiasmo, Karla trabaja brindando atención al público en un restaurante de su ciudad, todos los días desde tempranas horas ella inicia su labor, ella puede trabajar un aproximado de 10 horas diarias y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Karla se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de una pequeña cocina, la cual usará para la preparación de postres para su venta, así ella espera aumentar sus ingresos económicos, los cuales poco a poco los ahorrará para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda tener su propio negocio y con ello desea junto a su familia salir adelante.

loans.use: Para la compra de una pequeña cocina.

loans.name: Stefano Dyan

texts.es:
Stefano es un joven de 20 años, vive en la ciudad de Pisco con su pareja y si pequeño hijo de un año, él es una persona muy amable, responsable y trabajador, que junto con su pareja dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente Stefano no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Administración de Empresas, pero le gustaría mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta hacer deporte y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Pato para compartir con su familia. 
Con mucho empeño, entusiasmo y gracias al apoyo de su Madre, Stefano puso en marcha su pequeño negocio de venta de ropa, tanto para damas y caballeros, todos los días desde tempranas horas inicia su labor, él puede trabajar un aproximado de 12 horas diarias y cree que le va bien por su dedicación y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Stefano se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mercadería, tales como: polos, chompas, pantalones, casacas, entre otras prendas de vestir; de esta manera Stefano tendrá su negocio abastecido, con ello él espera poder aumentar sus ventas e incrementar sus ingresos económicos, los cuales poco a poco ahorrará para ampliar su negocio y así desea lograr su sueño de tener su casa propia y su local propio para seguir trabajando.

loans.use: Para la compra de mercadería, tales como: polos, chompas, pantalones, casacas, etc.

loans.name: Briggite Yeralddin

texts.es:
Briggite tiene 20 años, vive en la ciudad de Pisco, ciudad caracterizada por sus lugares turísticos como las “Islas Ballestas” y el “Candelabro de Paracas”, asimismo se desarrolla la agricultura en especial el cultivo de maíz, algodón,  entre otros. Cuando dispone de un tiempo libre le gusta mucho jugar vóley con sus vecinas y amigas de su barrio, asimismo en ocasiones le encanta comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “Arroz con Pato”. Debido a sus pocos recursos económicos ella solo pudo estudiar hasta el quinto grado de educación secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado mucho estudiar la carrera de enfermería.

Día a día Briggite traba en su pequeño negocio de venta de ropa para damas, caballeros y niños, ella le dedica a su negocio alrededor de 9 horas al dia y puede atender hasta 25 clientes diariamente; ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es conocida y sobre todo porque es amable con los clientes y sobre todo porque ofrece productos de calidad a un bajo precio.

Briggite está muy alegre y agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar mostradores y comprar mercadería para su negocio como polos, chompas, pantalones, |entre otros; de esta manera ella podrá exhibir sus productos de mejor manera y también tendrá más variedad de productos para ofrecer a sus clientes, lo que le permitirá seguir luchando para poder realizar su más grande sueño:” Tener su casa propia y tener un local para su negocio”.

loans.use: Para la compra de mostradores y mercaderia (polos, chompas, pantalones, entre otros)

loans.name: Luis Enrique

texts.es:
Luis es un hombre de 28 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente por la necesidad de trabajar para apoyar a sus padres y solventar sus gastos, no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta compartir gratos momentos con su familia. 
Con mucho empeño y entusiasmo, Luis trabaja como chofer de taxi, él cuenta con un pequeño auto el cual utiliza para brindar servicios de transporte, todos los días desde tempranas horas de mañana él sale a recorrer las calles de su ciudad en búsqueda de pasajeros, Luis puede trabajar un aproximado de 8 horas diarias y cree que le va bien por su dedicación y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Luis se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada realizar la refacción y el mantenimiento general de su auto; de esta manera Luis tendrá su herramienta de trabajo en mejores condiciones para así poder brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes, así él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para salir adelante.

loans.use: Para realizar la refacción y el mantenimiento de su auto.

loans.name: Angela Fiorella

texts.es:
Ángela es una joven de 20 años, es soltera, vive en la ciudad de Ica con sus padres y hermanos, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de sus padres Ángela se encuentra estudiando la carrera profesional de Administración de Empresas, en sus ratos libres le gusta compartir gratos momentos con su familia.
Con mucho empeño y entusiasmo, Ángela trabaja como asistente administrativo en una empresa de su ciudad, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana asiste a su centro de trabajo para iniciar su labor, ella puede trabajar un aproximado de 8 horas diarias y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Ángela se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la construcción de una habitación en su vivienda; de esta manera Ángela brindar un ambiente más seguro y adecuado, con mayor bienestar para ella y su familia, así ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para cumplir su gran sueño de ser una buena profesional y junto a su familia desea poder salir adelante.

loans.use: Para realizar la construcción de una habitación en su vivienda.

loans.name: Martita

texts.es:
Martita es una mujer muy trabajadora, tiene 30 maños y junto a su esposo trabajan muy duro para poder sacar adelante a sus 2 pequeños de 8 y 4 meses de edad, ya que son el regalo más grande que Dios le ha podido dar y sobre todo porque los ama muchísimo. Su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de Pucallpa, ciudad que se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido y acogedor, se encuentra ubicada en la selva peruana, en la cual hay flora y fauna bellísima y sus paisajes son hermosos. Cuando dispone de un tiempito libre le encanta salir a pasear con su familia y también le encanta en ocasiones disfrutar de uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo   “Patarashca de Pescado”. 

Con  mucho empeño Martita atiende día a día su negocio de alquiler de mototaxi, así como también vende parrilladas los fines de semana, con lo cual apoya a su esposo con los gastos del hogar; ella trabaja alrededor de 8 horas al día y los fines de semana o cuando hay alguna festividad en su ciudad puede trabajar hasta 10 horas; ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy amable con los clientes y sobre todo tiene muy buena sazón para la preparación de platillos.

Martita está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que  gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar materiales para colocar un techo afuera de su vivienda para su negocio de parrillada,  ella podrá comprar calaminas, clavos, listones, entre otros, ya que en su ciudad hay lluvias de manera continua, lo que le permitirá dar mayor comodidad a los clientes y mejorar sus ingresos, así ella podrá seguir trabajando y luchando por hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle una buena educación a sus hijos y tener un negocio más grande”.

loans.use: Para la compra de calaminas, clavos, listones, enter otros

loans.name: Hector Jesus

texts.es:
Héctor es un hombre de 23 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Pisco, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y la necesidad de trabajar no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Administración de Empresas que deseaba, pero sueña con poder hacerlo muy pronto, en sus ratos libres le gusta hacer deporte y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Pato para compartir con su familia.
Con mucho empeño, entusiasmo y gracias al apoyo de su Madre, Héctor puso en marcha su pequeño negocio de venta de juguetes y regalos, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor, él puede trabajar un aproximado de 12 horas y cree que le va bien por su dedicación y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Héctor se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mercadería, tales como: peluches, postales y juguetes diversos; de esta manera Héctor tendrá su negocio mejor abastecido, con ello él espera poder aumentar sus ventas e incrementar sus ingresos económicos, los cuales le servirán de mucho para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda iniciar sus estudios profesionales y ampliar su negocio.

loans.use: Para la compra de mercadería, tales como: peluches, postales y juguetes.

loans.name: Jesus Simon

texts.es:
Jesús es un hombre de 35 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Ica, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo por salir adelante; lamentablemente Jesús no ha podido estudiar la carrera profesional de Ingeniería Agrónomo que deseaba, pero le hubiera gustado poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta dedicar un poco de tiempo a la lectura y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Lomo Saltado para compartir con su familia.
Con mucho empeño y entusiasmo, Jesús trabaja como chofer de taxi, él alquila un pequeño auto, el cual utiliza para poder trabajar, todas los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor, él sale a recorrer las calles de su ciudad en búsqueda de pasajeros, Jesús puede trabajar un aproximado de 12 horas diarias y cree que le va bien por su dedicación y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Jesús se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de un auto; de esta manera Jesús tendrá su propia herramienta de trabajo, la cual podrá utilizar para su entera disposición, con ello él espera seguir trabajando y aumentando sus ingresos económicos, los cuales poco a poco ahorrará para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda tener su casa propia.

loans.use: Para realizar la compra de un auto.

loans.name: Ana Isabel

texts.es:
Ana es un mujer de 42 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica, en el distrito de Santiago con sus 2 hijos, a quienes son su principal razón en la vida, lamentablemente por diversas razones se separó de su pareja, desde entonces ella dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia, lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos no pudo estudiar una carrera de alta costura que deseaba, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta ver novelas y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Chicharrón de Pollo para compartir con su familia.
Con mucho empeño y entusiasmo, Ana trabaja como obrera en un fundo agrícola de su ciudad, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia sus labores de campo, ella puede trabajar un aproximado de 10 horas diarias y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño, dedicación y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Ana se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el inicio de la construcción de su vivienda, de esta manera ella tendrá un pequeño módulo donde podrá vivir con sus hijas, así ella espera poder seguir trabajando y esforzándose para terminar de construir su vivienda y con ello poder brindarles mayor seguridad y bienestar para su familia.

loans.use: Para realizar el inicio de la construcción de su vivienda.

loans.name: Rosario

texts.en:
Rosario G. is from the village of Lugdungan. She is 59 years old, married and has six adult children. Rosario operates a family member's business in the agriculture sector, primarily planting rice. Now she has a business hog raising aside from farming. She has been engaged in this business for over three years and earns approximately 4,000 PHP a month. 

In 2010, Rosario joined PMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. Rosario is requesting a loan of 13,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase of feed for her four pigs. This will be the 4th loan taken out by Rosario from PMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: To purchase feed for her hog fattening

loans.name: Maximillan  Apeli

texts.en:
Maximillan is 24 years old and married. She does tailoring to earn a living. She has engaged in this business for three years.  In addition, she sells small fish (omena) to supplement her income. 

Since she became a client of Faulu Kenya, Maximillan has learned how to save because she has been trained on financial management. She dreams of expanding her business in the future. She has requested for a loan of 20,000 KES to buy fabrics.

loans.use: buy fabrics

loans.name: Johnson

texts.en:
Johnson is a 50-year-old married man. He has 3 children with ages ranging from 8 years to 17 years. He describes himself to be a self-motivated man. 

Johnson operates a poultry business where he sells chickens. He has been involved in this business for 2 years and employs 1 staff member. His business is located at a potential business area and his primary customers are hotels.  He describes his biggest business challenge to be high transportation cost used when delivering chickens to customers.  

Johnson will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy chickens to resell. His business goal is to buy more chicks within 5 years. He hopes that in the future, he can buy an incubator .

loans.use: buy 200 chickens

loans.name: Rosemary

texts.en: Rosemary is 46 years old, married and has three children.  She does livestock farming.  She rears pigs, poultry and dairy cows.  She has been in this  business since the year 2000. She works hard in her business so as to provide for her family.  Through Faulu Kenya, she has improved her business because she has been trained on business management skills.  Rosemary needs a loan of 20,000 KES to buy pigs and chicks.

loans.use: buy pigs and chicks

loans.name: Andrea Jusseth

texts.es:
Andrea es una mujer de 28 años, vive en la ciudad de Chincha con su pequeño hijo de 4 años, a quien ama y es su principal razón en la vida, lastimosamente por diversas razones se separó de su esposo, desde entonces ella dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar, Andrea no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Administración de Empresas que deseaba, pero le hubiera gustado mucho hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar con su pequeño y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Lomo Saltado para compartir con su familia.
